title: PDF Expert can handle all your PDF editing chores, now it’s under $70
content:
Macworld

While Macs are incredible for various tasks, they’re not so compatible with PDFs. Managing PDFs on any Mac is difficult, but PDF Expert can make it easier. For a limited time, you can grab PDF Expert, Apple Editor’s Choice, for only $69.99 (reg. $139).

PDF Expert makes it simple to modify text, images, and links in a PDF document on Macs. Along with a variety of markup tools to highlight, strikeout, underline, and more for just the right annotation, filling out PDF forms with interactive fields is quick work for PDF Expert. 

Meanwhile, nifty features also allow you to convert PDFs into a handful of other popular file formats, edit images imported from a scanner or iOS device, assemble a collection of PDFs for printing, and more.

And since PDF Expert’s AI power is so smart, it can recognize both text and OCR and even use machine learning to fix the typical problems that less advanced PDF managers can’t. Just push the Enhance mode, and PDF Expert can correct distortions, remove shadows, and improve a document’s contrast, so even tough-to-read PDFs will look brilliant.

Grab lifetime access to PDF Expert for just $69.99, best price online.

 

PDF Expert One-Time Purchase: Lifetime License

Only $69.99 through Macworld

Prices subject to change.
